I have managed to reach another stranger world in orbit of another star.
It is a small moon of a gas planet. The moon has a thin but breathable atmosphere. The climate is unexpectedly hot and humid, and is thus very similar to the tropics.
I can still survive here without any problems. I call this world Tyros!
